content.raw:
since this pull request was released, I've noticed `make coverage` hang in an ign-common pull request:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/59/expanding-the-functionality-of-the-plugin/diff
* [pipeline timed out after 120 minutes](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/580), so I reduced the timeout to 10 minutes in #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/commits/c0643d62603ddb835ccb5c24f301a0fe20150a01
content.html:
since this pull request was released, I've noticed make coverage hang in an ign-common pull request:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/59/expanding-the-functionality-of-the-plugin/diff
  • pipeline timed out after 120 minutes, so I reduced the timeout to 10 minutes in #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/commits/c0643d62603ddb835ccb5c24f301a0fe20150a01
